description.narrative: -The project will: - Create 300 direct employment at the production facility and an additional 200-300 indirect jobs in Egypt, plus several hundred temporary jobs tied to the construction period. - Generate fiscal benefits through increased taxes. - Support Egyptian economy in foreign trade balance in terms of both decreased import and increased export. - Procure from local suppliers and support them. - Bring manufacturing management and technical know-how to Egypt and leverage sectors it serves. - Will help to provide timely delivery to the customers and develop the industry in Egypt. - Will have the capability to manufacture from recycled materials

The Project, sponsored by Elif Plastik Ambalaj ve Ticaret A.S. (Elif Plastik), of approximately US$64 million is to construct and operate a new packaging facility in the industrial area in Cairo, Egypt, and to provide funding for general corporate purposes, mostly working capital, for Elif Plastik main operating facility in Istanbul, Turkey.

participating-org.narrative: ELIF PLASTIK AMBALAJ SANAYI VE TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

name.narrative: Elif Plastik is located in Istanbul, Turkey. The new packaging facility, Elif Global Packaging S.A.E. (Elif) is located in the industrial area of Cairo, Egypt.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
